View tuition fees for future years In addition to tuition fees you also need to pay for:Student services and amenities fee (SSAF) in each calendar year.Overseas Student Health Cover (OSHC)- Student visa holders must have cover for the total duration of their visa.Some programs incuradditional expenses.You also need to account for your living expenses. Estimate thecost of livingin Melbourne.In addition to tuition fees, you will be charged an annualstudent services and amenities fee (SSAF), which is used to maintain and enhance services and amenities that improve your experience as an RMIT student.The SSAF is calculated based on your enrolment load and the maximum fee for 2025 is $365. Overseas Student Health Cover (OSHC)- Student visa holders must have cover for the total duration of their visa. Some programs incuradditional expenses. You also need to account for your living expenses. Estimate thecost of livingin Melbourne. In addition to tuition fees, you will be charged an annualstudent services and amenities fee (SSAF), which is used to maintain and enhance services and amenities that improve your experience as an RMIT student.The SSAF is calculated based on your enrolment load and the maximum fee for 2025 is $365. Find information on how to apply for arefundas a continuing international student. RMIT awards more than 2000 scholarships every year to recognise academic achievement and assist students from a variety of backgrounds.
